summary:
Ik ben een enthousiaste Modern Workplace Consultant met een passie voor de moderne werkplek op basis van Windows 10 & 11. Mijn expertises liggen bij Enterprise Mobility & Security (EM+S), met een speciale focus op Microsoft Intune, Identity & Access Management via Azure Active Directory, Office 365, Azure Virtual Desktop, Windows 365, en Defender for Endpoint. Het automatiseren van taken met PowerShell en het integreren van deze automatisering met de Graph API is wel echt iets wat ik bij al mijn taken probeer te doen.

Sinds 2019 omarm ik een Agile-werkwijze, waarbij ik vertrouwd ben met Scrum en hulpmiddelen zoals Confluence, Jira en Azure DevOps. 

Mijn interesses reiken verder dan alleen de Microsoft wereld (Maar is wel waar mijn professionele focus op ligt). Ik heb een brede fascinatie voor Linux en ben vertrouwd met verschillende distributies zoals Ubuntu, Debian, Kali en BlackArch. Daarnaast heb ik mijn eigen Home Labs om te experimenteren en te leren. Dit bestaat uit een Azure DEV Tenant, MSDN subscription, NAS, Unifi netwerk, Raspberry Pi clusters. Doe ik dit 24/7? Zeker niet, ik hou ook van tijd doorbrengen met mijn gezin, gamen, retro games verzamelen, Vinyl, koken, bbqen, boksen en basketbal. 

Verder heb ik de volgende eigenschappen: klantvriendelijkheid, flexibiliteit, doorzettingsvermogen en integriteit. Ik houd van een pragmatische aanpak en ben altijd bereid om snel nieuwe technologieën te leren.

Mijn professionele reis heeft mij de volgende certificaten opgeleverd:

    Microsoft® Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert (Geldig tot augustus 2024)
    Microsoft® Certified: Solutions Expert: Mobility (MCSE) (Sccm & Intune)
    Microsoft® Certified: Solutions Associate (MCSA) (Windows 10)
    Microsoft® Certified: Solutions Associate (MCSA) (Windows Server 2012)
    Microsoft® Certified: Professional (Windows Server 2008)
    Microsoft® Certified: Technology Specialist (Windows Server 2008)

Momenteel ben ik bezig met het behalen van:

    Microsoft® 365 Certified: Identity and Access Administrator Associate
    Microsoft® 365 Certified: Security Administrator Associate
    Microsoft® 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert

🚀 #ModernWorkplace #Microsoft #ITConsulting #Intune #Defender #Security #EnterpriseMobility #IdentityandAccess #Azure

projects.title: Administratief Project Medewerker - Kadaster
projects.description: Voor Kadaster locaties door het hele land worden er Cisco Access Points uitgerold. Deze moesten klaar gemaakt worden voor de uitrol en geregistreerd worden in de CMDB. Werkzaamheden bestonden van het uitpakken van de Access Points, uitpakken van de Wireless modules, uitpakken van de switches, testen van de Access Points, testen van de Switches, stickeren van de Cisco AP's en Cisco Wireless Modules, registreren van de Cisco AP's en Wireless Modules, fotos maken van de complete AP+Module en weer project klaar maken met alle benodigdheden om te functioneren op locatie.

projects.title: Proof of Concept: working remote for V&D
projects.description:
Setting up a proof of concept for V&D; a new solution to help employees work from home. Solutions used were from Aruba Networks. 

Responsibilities:
-Design LAN,WAN internet/intranet connections for all equipment
-Communicate and negotiate with  users, maintenance team and suppliers
-Complex network related problem analyses, diagnoses and solutions
-configuring secure conections between different location to high-end systems
-Researching and setting up a more profitable way of 2 factor authentication via OTP
-Writing user manuals to set up and install the Aruba "VIA Client"
-Assisting in the guidance of test users in the Proof of Concept

profile_positions.description: My job is to manage and contribute to business projects with in Mileway as well as initiate platform improvements and handle complex changes. I am part of the IT OPS project team. I am responsible for Identity and Access Management, Endpoint Configuration, Device Compliance and Defender for Endpoint.
profile_positions.title: Modern Workplace Consultant (via Wortell)

profile_positions.description:
I design, manage and implement solutions regarding the Modern Workplace.

- Create Functional & Technical Designs
- Discuss with the client what is needed for their digital workplace set a framework to facilitate a functional and secure Workplace.
- Implement Technical Solutions: Configuration Policies, Automation and Customization via Powershell & Microsoft Graph, Windows Autopilot, Azure Virtual Desktop, Identity & Access Management, Identity Governance, Azure Active Directory solutions (SaaS, Single Sign On, Access Packages, Enterprise Applications, App Registrations), Windows 10 & 11, Application Packaging & Migrations, & Office 365 deployments.
- Implement Endpoint Security: Conditional Access, Compliancy, Security Baseline Benchmarking (CIS) & Defender for Endpoint / Microsoft 365 Defender.
- Mobile Device Management: Mobile Application Management & Mobile Device Management for IOS and Android platforms. 
- Package Applications using Powershell / MSIX from beginning to end (Intake, create a package, Technical Acceptance Testing, User Acceptance Testing, Migration/Deployment)
- Technical Project lead
profile_positions.title: Modern Workplace Consultant

profile_positions.description: My job was to set up the modern workplace from scratch. New policies and compliance. Frequent meetings with the CISO and other members of security to make sure that the devices were compliant and according to the design.
profile_positions.title: Modern Workplace Consultant (via Wortell)

profile_positions.description: Fixing Application Packages, Fixing Autopilot Set up helping with the configuration of Laptops and Stand Alone Desktops.
profile_positions.title: Modern Workplace Consultant (via Wortell)

profile_positions.description:
Als consultant werk ik in verschillende bedrijven die ook in verschillende sectoren aanwezig zijn. Hier leer ik veel van en houd het werk en mijn omgeving interresant. Tot nu toe heb ik in de Retail, Energie, Verzekeringen en voor de regering gewerkt. Ik focus mij vooral op IT transformatie projecten in het technische en management aspect. Bovendien wil ik mij verder ontwikkelen aan de kant van de IT Infrastuctuur met onder andere virtualisatie (Citrix, VMware) & SCCM als speerpunten.

English:
Working as a consultant allows me to work for different companies in all types of industries. So far I've worked in Retail, Electric Utilities, Insurance, Finance & for the Government. I focus on IT transformation projects in both the technical and managerial aspect. I want to develop myself towards the IT Infrastructure side with virtualisation (Citrix, VMware) & SCCM as main focus.
profile_positions.title: IT Infrastructure Consultant

profile_positions.description: Coordinating projects and planning for a group of 3 project managers. I also facilitate the intake for new projects, I am the single point of contact for the project office for the Service Desk of Capgemini.
profile_positions.title: IT Consultant - Project Coordinator (PMO)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Workplace & Enterprise Mobility. Workplace is Azure Active Directory, Intune, Windows Autopilot enrolled, Application deployment, Device Management, The Packaging Pipeline, System Performance, Azure Active Directory & Troubleshooting are my main responsibilities. 

I am also responsible for Mobile Devices, Android, IOS, Samsung Knox & Google Play Business Store. 

I am also the link between projects and managed services. While working in an agile manner. 

My tasks include 
-Intune Specialist
-Application Intakes
-Application Packaging(traditional, MSIX, WIN32 Application Wrapping)
-Application Deployment
-Azure Active Directory
-Windows 10 
-Autopilot
-Device Security
-Mobile Device Management

Project: Workplace 2020
-Migrating legacy applications from SCCM to Intune. 
- Setting up the entire chain from Intake - Re-packaging - TEchnical Acceptation Test, Functional Acceptation Test and finally creating a production ready application
- Re-packaging Applications to be compatible with Intune deployment (MSIX, Win32)
- Setting up Autopilot
- Setting up Device Configuration, Deployment configuration and Restrictions
- Setting up Azure Ad Application Groups from the Microsoft Graph API
- Determine settings for 3 types of Laptops and 2 types of Toughbooks. 
- Facilitate workshops for the Service desk 
-Setting up the governance around Application Intakes, Delivery Framework and conventions in Azure Active Directory.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer - Modern Workplace  via Capgemini

profile_positions.description:
Helping deliver IT services for System Center Configuration Manager Current Branch, Intune on Azure, Azure Active Directory, Azure Role Based Access, Operating System Deployment, Windows 10, Mobile Device management via Intune, Application intakes & Packaging. As well as deliver additional support on any of the above services such as helping with transformation or upgrade projects. 

Assist several 3rd parties with carving out and migrate  Mail, Sharepoint & One Drive to another tenant. 

New Workplace Project
-Windows 10 Autopilot
-InTune Application Deployment
-Migrate and implement a new application landscape
-Packaging using MSIX and IntuneWin wrapper. Writing an installation template for all Win32 Legacy Applications. Powershell is used as an install and uninstall script. Using this method, legacy applications can be deployed via intune and the installation process is logged complete on the device for future troubleshooting.
-Assist in the automation process of Application assignments via Service Now. 
Implement Office 365
Roll out new Laptops

Joulz & JES Carve Out Project
-Migrate Mail, Sharepoint and One Drive to another Third Party (Tenant to Tenant Migration using Bit-Titan.
profile_positions.title: Modern Workplace Consultant via Capgemini

profile_positions.description: Hosting and presenting a workshop to facilitate a discussion between Denso Europe and Denso Japan for a Microsoft Azure Tenant to Tenant Migration. Involving Office 365, Teams, Sharepoint, Intune Mobile Device Management, Mobile Application Management & Conditional Access in Azure Active Directory. Deliverables are a solution outline for the upcoming migration.
profile_positions.title: Senior IT Infrastructure Consultant via Capgemini

profile_positions.description:
Working on a project for Eneco that consists of multiple streams. 

I am responsible for helping implement IBM QRadar, configuring AD Windows Servers for a Wincollector Agent and other Wintel servers for an agentless method. 

Capgemini is also implementing new Multi Functional Printers and it is my job to assist Xerox in configuring the new Print servers, installing Equitrack 5.7. As well as roll out the new Printer Drivers and Que, helping with the migration. 

Capgemini is setting up a new Windows 10 VDI environment for Eneco as well, using Citrix. My job is to help configure the Windows 10 Image, updating the Wim File, configuring the master template, help configure the MDT server, updating the image with the latest security patches and upgrading it to Windows 10 - 1803. Making 2 images one for Citrix Xen Server and one seperate image for Azure using Hyper-V.
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Lead via Capgemini

profile_positions.description:
Eneco and Stedin must separate their IT services according to the Authority Consumer Market (ACM). This forces the separation of all IT services and IT components shared by the Eneco and Stedin business units.

After the research phase which I did for all applications with in SCCM for Stedin. We start building the new Stedin domain. This will consist of a Azure Active Directory with servers running Windows Server 2016 and SCCM 2016.  It is my job to help build and configure the 2 new SCCM 2016 servers, configure WSUS updates and Windows Defender updates, migrate all packages and applications to the new Stedin Environment and re-package or edit a package to fit the new domain. Test all applications and furthermore assist with the acceptance phase of the migration.

-Create a detailed planning in conjunction with the Backend migration
-Install and configure SCCM 2016 in a Azure environment
-Configure WSUS and Windows Defender Updates
-Migrate applications as-is to the new Stedin domain
-Move/create Security Groups in Azure Active Directory 
-Re-package/Edit any application that is not compatible in the new Stedin Azure Domain

Also rolling out new VPN Profiles for multiple devices, Stedin wide for ~5000 users.
profile_positions.title: SCCM Migration Engineer via Capgemini

profile_positions.description:
Eneco and Stedin must separate their IT services according to the Authority Consumer Market (ACM). This forces the separation of all IT services and IT components shared by the Eneco and Stedin business units.

It is my job to research the frontend applications and review per application how to approach this for migration. 

- Active Directory Research
- Security Analysis
- Identity and Access Management
- Orca Analysis 
- Test Applications
-  Application intakes
- Write Documentation
- Organise Documentation
- Write Impact Analysis
- Write a migration Plan per application
profile_positions.title: SCCM Migration Engineer via Capgemini
